title: mastery 8, 9, and 10 ideas
body:
i think for the last 3 masteries should be harder to get and it'll show how skilled you are at the campion 
so for m8 you should need just 4 S or S+
m9 6 s+ and over 200k mastery points
m10  10 s+ over 300k mastery points 
and once you get m10 i believe riot should make exclusive skins for all champions for when you reach m10 with them call mastery so for example. mastery yasuo (god forbid) mastery garen, mastery jinx etc.
